name: The Legend of Gus
description:
Adventures from across the continent flock to the mysterious dungeons and catacombs of Millhelm in hopes of gold and glory. A Perilous expedition the locals say, many have dared to enter only never to return. So rare in fact, no living soul has seen someone complete the voyage. Only folk stories and fables remain about brave heroes of past. All speak of one name...    

LEGEND OF GUS

Artist- Jay Hunns https://www.artstation.com/apologise

Artist- James Foster https://www.artstation.com/yetisweat

Artist- Andy Brocklesby

Programmer- Jake

Programmer- Alex
